comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Possibly wife of Cyril Patrick William Francis Radclyffe Dugmore (May 20, 1882 – January 22, 1966) was a British track and field athlete who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics.

comment._content:

comment._content: Thanks for the additional info Richard Arthur Norton and pennylrichardsca. We'll add her name to the record.
